items.caption: 各自然村服务情况数据

update.sql:
SELECT TOP 5 gName, SUM(gQuantity) AS totalQuantity
FROM eGoods
GROUP BY gName
ORDER BY totalQuantity DESC;
SELECT gName,gQuantity FROM eGoods WHERE gId <6
SELECT gQuantity FROM eGoods WHERE gId=8
